title: Vaibhav Lakshmi Kasulaperu Haaram with Emerald Accents
materials: SI Clarity). Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a classic kasulaperu (coin) design reimagined with floral motifs encrusted with shimmering CZ stones. The radiant pear-shaped emeralds add a touch of royalty. The multi-strand design creates a cascading effect, highlighting the intricate craftsmanship. Meticulously handcrafted by artisans from the old city of Hyderabad, each coin is carefully linked to ensure a fluid and graceful drape.
colors: and Brilliant White (CZ stones). A vibrant and auspicious color combination symbolizing prosperity and good fortune.
occasions: or any grand celebration. Its regal look also makes it ideal for festive occasions like Ugadi and Sankranti.
description: A stunning blend of tradition and elegance, this Kasulaperu Haaram is a timeless investment. The use of high-quality emeralds and brilliant-cut CZs ensures exceptional sparkle and brilliance. The piece's intricate detailing and durable craftsmanship make it a cherished heirloom to be passed down through generations. Symbolically, the Kasulaperu represents wealth and prosperity, making it a meaningful and auspicious addition to your jewelry collection.
